comments.author: Stefan Guggisberg
comments.body:
reimplemented NodeState internals to improve performance when 
handling nodes with large number of child node entries 
(svn r. 373549)

comments.author: Stefan Guggisberg
comments.body: committed further NodeState optimizations which should improve performance significantly when dealing with 'heavy' nodes (svn r. 375921).

summary: serious performance degradation of node operations when node has a large number of child nodes (e.g. > 10k child node entries)
